org.netbeans.modules.progress.spi

Class InternalHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.progress.spi.InternalHandle

  • public class InternalHandle
extends Object
    Instances provided by the ProgressHandleFactory allow the users of the API to notify the progress bar UI about changes in the state of the running task.
    Since:
    org.netbeans.api.progress/1 1.18

      • getLastPingTime

        public long getLastPingTime()
        Returns the last time the progress was updated. he timestamp is updated on start, stop, every progress report and determinate / indeterminate switch. Generally every time the ProgressHandle client publishes some information.
        Returns:
        timestamp of last update, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        1.45
